name: Ape Escape Remake (Fan-Game)
description:
This fan remake is based on the classic Playstation 1 game Ape Escape, an 3D platformer where the player traverse several different environments to capture monkeys who have gone back in time and are causing trouble everywhere.

This was created as a challenge to see how a Ape Escape would look like if it was created for today's consoles like the Playstation 5.

How to Play

Catch all the wild Monkeys and return to the base.

Controls

Keyboard & Mouse

Movement: W,A,S,D
Jump: Space Bar
Crawl: Left Shift
Stun Club Swing: Left Mouse Button
Time Net Capture: Right Mouse Button

Controller

Movement: Left Thumbstick 
Jump: Right Trigger / Right Shoulder
Crawl: Left Thumbstick Press
Equip Stun Club: Y Button
Equip Time Net: A Button
Attack: Right Thumbstick

Credits

Ape Escape Logo by TeckGec
Music by Turret 3471
Spike, Time Net and Stun Club model by quiet_art
Spike Voice Over by cratchett
Pipo Monkey model by mathpaula28
